title: can we get a new zilean skin?
body: maybe a man in the moon {{champion:26}}  zilean? its been a couple years since he has had a new skin and i think it would be awesome if he got another one soon  if you have an idea for one id like to hear it :)

replies.body: dw bud Proffesor Zilean is coming into league sooner or later (Academy related skin)

Actually you're right. it was leaked with the project skins "academy Lux, varus, some other one and professor zilean"

I agree! I still want an ultimate Zilean skin that ages backwards and ends up young Zilean.

Iv'e heard this a ZILEAN TIMES!
